remarks: Composition in the category of categories.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catcbas.c $e |- C = ( CatCat ` U ) $.
catcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
catcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
catcco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
catccofval $p |- ( ph -> .x. = ( v e. ( B X. B ) , z e. B |-> ( g e. ( ( 2nd ` v ) Func z ) , f e. ( Func ` v ) |-> ( g o.func f ) ) ) ) $.
$d B v z $.
$d U v z $.
$d f g ph v z $.
